DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..
Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
I found a Nomai computer that predicts where meteors land on Brittle Hollow, but..

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Is it true that Brittle Hollow's south pole never gets hit by meteors?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: There's not really anywhere totally safe on Brittle Hollow because of the Quantum Moon.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Riebeck was really worried about their ship getting hit by a meteor and leaving them stranded.. So they studied Brittle Hollow to find a spot safe from meteors before they took off...</size>

<size=20>Riebeck told me that the safest spot on Brittle Hollow from meteors was the south pole, so that's where they'll leave their ship... But nobody in the village knows if that's really true.</size>
<size=20>Brittle Hollow looks so cool, I wanna go there if I become an astronaut one day.. But I don't want to be stranded there, either...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Maybe I'll go ask Riebeck what they know, then.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Just be careful where you land your ship if you go to Brittle Hollow, okay..?</size>
<size=20>But... Why is their computer sometimes right and sometimes wrong..?</size>

DialogueOption.Text: It's because the Quantum Moon's gravity messes with where meteors land.

Dialogue.Page: <size=20>Tell me if you learn more.. Please?</size>
<size=20>The Quantum Moon is the weird moon that orbits around every planet in the star system, right..? I guess it makes sense for it to cause weird things to happen...</size>
<size=20>So... If the Quantum Moon stays away, the meteors won't be so random and unpredictable...</size>
<size=20>Once I become an astronaut, I just need to find some way to know where the Quantum Moon always is then...</size>

DialogueOption.Text: Hey, Galena. Got any questions about the universe for me?
